description: Represents a privacy budget within a collaboration

Key.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: An arbitrary set of tags (key-value pairs) for this cleanrooms privacy budget template.
Tags.markdownDescription:
An arbitrary set of tags (key-value pairs) for this cleanrooms privacy budget template.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

AutoRefresh.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: CALENDAR_MONTH | NONE  
Update requires: Replacement

PrivacyBudgetType.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: DIFFERENTIAL_PRIVACY  
Update requires: Replacement

Required: Yes  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

Required: Yes  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

Required: Yes
